hero.title: Logistics solutions for Technology and Electronics
hero.description: We protect your high-value devices with secure logistics, traceability and specialized handling.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we design logistics solutions for the technology sector. We handle high-value devices, components and accessories with advanced control, security and process integration.

items.title: Secure Warehousing
items.description: Controlled facilities with access surveillance, inventory insurance and WMS for real-time traceability.

items.title: Specialized Distribution
items.description: Safe routes with GPS tracking, real-time signature and delivery confirmation for high-value products.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Initial setup, kitting, serialization, labeling and technical packaging according to each channel.

items.title: Technical Courier
items.description: Urgent deliveries of parts, samples or critical components with chain of custody.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Technology import coordination, customs procedures and temporary admission regimes for components.

benefits.title: Security, speed and accuracy
items: Total traceability by serial, IMEI or SKU.
Integration with client ERP or WMS systems.
Reduced time to market for launches.

items.title: Product launches
items.fullDesc: Synchronized distribution for new device releases.

items.title: Retail replenishment
items.fullDesc: Continuous supply to retail chains and e-commerce.

items.title: B2B deliveries
items.fullDesc: Deliveries to corporate customers with chain of custody.

items.title: Spare parts kitting
items.fullDesc: Component assembly for technical service or warranty.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications and security protocols that protect your products at every stage.
